description: Books, quotes, poems, stories. The Quill Guild: the website for writers like you with content from writers like you.
indexIntro: The Quill Guild is a place where we want to share our creativeness: poems, stories, short forms like aphorisms or anecdotes.
indexSoon: You'll find more updates about parts of our websites ready to use soon: messages, quotes, books, etc.
title: The Quill Guild
